title: US DOT Decals
description: US DOT Decals offers compliant US Department of Transportation vehicle decals. They wanted a tool for customers to design and see a live-preview of their decals to boost conversion and I made that happen.

title: M-Cube Engineering
description: M-Cube is an engineering firm that provides a range of services and integrated maintenance solutions. The admin tool I built for them enables them to manage their quotation and invoices more efficiently.

title: ReDeal
description: ReDeal aims to help people maximize the profit from the sale of their home. I helped them build an interactive home sale calculator that helps customers to get a rough estimate of the value of their property instantly.
